entry.title: 不折腾
entry.content:
```cpp hanoi.cpp / * Filename: hanoi.cpp * Last modified: 2012-05-30 18:47 * Author: Chen Jiang(姜晨) -- orange8637@gmail.com * Description: 汉诺塔问题 /

include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

void move(int n, char from, char to, char aux) {

if(n==1)
{
    printf("move %d from %c to %c\n", n, from ,to);
}
else
{
    move(n-1, from, aux, to);
    printf("move %d from %c to %c\n", n, from, to, aux);
    move(n-1, aux, to, from);
}

} int main() {

    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    move(n,'a','c','b');

return 0;

}

```bash shell.sh
